To celebrate the start of the cold, depressing December/January season in Toronto, we're raffling out $1,000 in free credit!

[Luna Node](https://www.lunanode.com/) is a Toronto cloud platform featuring extensive functionality: live snapshots, volumes (block storage), startup scripts, modern noVNC console, shelving (de-allocate your VM so you only pay for storage/IPs), etc.

Check out the shitty video I made this morning that highlights some of the features in our panel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JRq5k_foArc

Raffle winners will each receive $20 in credit if you're a new customer, or $5 if you're an existing customer (we'll run additional rounds of the raffle with the leftover credit). The credit will expire in 60 days. To enter the raffle, simply post a comment below. Only pre-existing LET members are eligible, so don't bother trying to sign up fifty new accounts! The raffle will end at 4 December 2018 midnight ET.
